attributes.action: Keep Metrocar 4001 in it's Original Condition and Livery
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to keep Metrocar 4001, the first of the Metrocars to be built and the only Metrocar in the original Tyne and Wear PTE Livery to be kept from refurbishment. To carry on representing the history and pride of North East England

rejection.details: This is a matter for Tyne & Wear PTE.
